known_issues: PDF.js library not loaded error occurring in karigar mapping.

existing_features.title: Load the PDF.js browser library so that PDF uploads in Karigar Mapping can be parsed without throwing "PDF.js library not loaded".
Configure PDF.js worker setup at runtime (e.g., set pdfjsLib.GlobalWorkerOptions.workerSrc) so PDF parsing works reliably in production builds on the Internet Computer.

Improve the Karigar Mapping upload error message for missing PDF.js so it is actionable for end users (English), including guidance to retry or use Excel as a fallback when PDF parsing is unavailable.

projectName: Fix “PDF.js library not loaded” error for PDF karigar mapping uploads
